title: Plasmonic silver and gold nanoparticles: shape- and structure-modulated plasmonic functionality for point-of-caring sensing, bio-imaging and medical therapy
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00793F, Review Article
Yingjie Hang, Anyang Wang, Nianqiang Wu
Silver and gold nanoparticles have found extensive biomedical applications due to their strong localized surface plasmon resonance (LSPR) and intriguing plasmonic properties.
